committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970.

summary.text: Removes controls, under the Economic Stabilization Act, on the price levels of meat, poultry, eggs, dairy products and feed ingredient costs of the commercial livestock feeding industry.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970.
